title: GraphADT: Empowering interpretable predictions of acute dermal toxicity with Multi-View graph pooling and structure remapping
details: X Ma, X Fu, T Wang, L Zhuo, Q Zou - Bioinformatics, 2024
abstract: Motivation Accurate prediction of acute dermal toxicity (ADT) is essential for the safe and effective development of contact drugs. Currently, graph neural networks (GNNs), a form of deep learning technology, accurately model the structure of …
